spirals.title: FGDC for Data Discovery - Mandatory
spirals.description: The FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata includes fields in the Identification Information and Metadata Reference Sections that are mandatory for data discovery. In the graphical representation of the standard, these are yellow fields included in yellow sections.

items.name: Resource Title
items.description: A short description of the resource. The title should be descriptive enough so that when a user is presented with a list of titles the general content of the data set can be determined.

items.name: Originating Organization
items.description: The organization responsible for creating the resource

items.name: Publication Date
items.description: Date of publication of the cited resource

items.name: Abstract
items.note: This concept is called Desciption in Catalog Services for the Web.
items.description: A paragraph describing the resource.

items.name: Purpose
items.description: A paragraph describing the original purpose for collecting the dataset.

items.name: Resource Status
items.description: The status of the resource

items.name: Resource Update Frequency
items.description: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Bounding Box
items.note: This concept is called Coverage in the CSW Specification
items.description: A bounding box for identifying a geographic area of interest

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

items.name: Resource Use Constraints
items.description: Information about how the data may or may not be used after access is granted to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the data set. Data providers may request acknowledgement of the data from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness of data.

items.name: Keyword
items.description: A word or phrase that describes some aspect of a resource. Can be one of several types.

items.name: Distribution Liability
items.description: Statement of the liability assumed by the distributor.

items.name: Distribution Contact
items.description: Contact information for the organization or individual that distributes the resource.

items.name: Metadata Contact
items.description: The organization or person currently responsible for the metadata.

items.name: Metadata Standard Citation
items.description: The name of the standard to which the metadata conforms

items.name: Metadata Standard Version
items.description: The name of the standard to which the metadata conforms

items.name: Ordering Instructions
items.description: General instructions, terms and services provided by the distributor

items.name: Resource Cost or Fees
items.description: Cost associated with access to the resource

items.name: Turnaround
items.description: Typical turnaround time for the filling of an order.

spirals.title: FGDC for Data Discovery - Mandatory if Applicable
spirals.description: The FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata includes many fields related to data understanding. These are generally labeled 'Mandatory if Applicable'. In the graphical representation of the standard, these are green fields included in yellow or green sections.

items.name: Attribute Accuracy Report
items.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the identification of the entities and assignments of values in the data set and a description of the tests used

items.name: Attribute Accuracy Value
items.description: An estimate of the accuracy of the identification of the entities and assignments of attribute values in the data set

items.name: Attribute Accuracy Explanation
items.description: The identification of the test that yielded the Attribute Accuracy Value.

items.name: Logical Consistency Report
items.description: An explanation of the fidelity of relationships in the data set and tests used.

items.name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Report
items.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the horizontal coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.

items.name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Value
items.description: An estimate of the accuracy of the horizontal coordinate measurements in the data set expressed in (ground) meters.

items.name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Explanation
items.description: The identification of the test that yielded the Horizontal Positional Accuracy Value.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Report
items.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Value
items.description: an estimate of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurement in the data set expressed in (ground) meters.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Explanation
items.description: The identification of the test that yielded the Vertical Positional Accuracy Value.

items.name: Source Citation
items.description: Reference to the processing input source.

items.name: Media
items.description: Media on which the resource is available

items.name: Source Time Period
items.description: Time period for which the source data set corresponds to the ground.

items.name: Source Citation Abbreviation
items.description: Short-form alias for the source citation.

items.name: Source Description
items.description: Detailed description of the source.

items.name: Process Step Description
items.description: Description of the event, including related parameters or tolerances.

items.name: Source Used
items.description: The source used in the processing step.

items.name: Process Step Time
items.description: Date, time, range or period of process step.

items.name: Source Produced
items.description: The source produced from the process step.

items.name: Processor
items.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organisation(s) associated with the process step.

items.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the identification of the entities and assignments of values in the data set and a description of the tests used

items.name: Attribute Accuracy Value
items.description: An estimate of the accuracy of the identification of the entities and assignments of attribute values in the data set

items.name: Attribute Accuracy Explanation
items.description: The identification of the test that yielded the Attribute Accuracy Value.

items.name: Logical Consistency Report
items.description: An explanation of the fidelity of relationships in the data set and tests used.

items.name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Report
items.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the horizontal coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.

items.name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Value
items.description: An estimate of the accuracy of the horizontal coordinate measurements in the data set expressed in (ground) meters.

items.name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Explanation
items.description: The identification of the test that yielded the Horizontal Positional Accuracy Value.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Report
items.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Value
items.description: an estimate of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurement in the data set expressed in (ground) meters.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Explanation
items.description: The identification of the test that yielded the Vertical Positional Accuracy Value.

items.name: Source Citation
items.description: Reference to the processing input source.

items.name: Media
items.description: Media on which the resource is available

items.name: Source Time Period
items.description: Time period for which the source data set corresponds to the ground.

items.name: Source Citation Abbreviation
items.description: Short-form alias for the source citation.

items.name: Source Description
items.description: Detailed description of the source.

items.name: Process Step Description
items.description: Description of the event, including related parameters or tolerances.

items.name: Source Used
items.description: The source used in the processing step.

items.name: Process Step Time
items.description: Date, time, range or period of process step.

items.name: Source Produced
items.description: The source produced from the process step.

items.name: Processor
items.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organisation(s) associated with the process step.

spirals.title: FGDC for Data Discovery - Mandatory
spirals.description: The FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata includes fields in the Identification Information and Metadata Reference Sections that are mandatory for data discovery. In the graphical representation of the standard, these are yellow fields included in yellow sections.

items.name: Resource Title
items.description: A short description of the resource. The title should be descriptive enough so that when a user is presented with a list of titles the general content of the data set can be determined.

items.name: Originating Organization
items.description: The organization responsible for creating the resource

items.name: Publication Date
items.description: Date of publication of the cited resource

items.name: Abstract
items.note: This concept is called Desciption in Catalog Services for the Web.
items.description: A paragraph describing the resource.

items.name: Purpose
items.description: A paragraph describing the original purpose for collecting the dataset.

items.name: Resource Status
items.description: The status of the resource

items.name: Resource Update Frequency
items.description: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Bounding Box
items.note: This concept is called Coverage in the CSW Specification
items.description: A bounding box for identifying a geographic area of interest

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

items.name: Resource Use Constraints
items.description: Information about how the data may or may not be used after access is granted to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the data set. Data providers may request acknowledgement of the data from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness of data.

items.name: Keyword
items.description: A word or phrase that describes some aspect of a resource. Can be one of several types.

items.name: Distribution Liability
items.description: Statement of the liability assumed by the distributor.

items.name: Distribution Contact
items.description: Contact information for the organization or individual that distributes the resource.

items.name: Metadata Contact
items.description: The organization or person currently responsible for the metadata.

items.name: Metadata Standard Citation
items.description: The name of the standard to which the metadata conforms

items.name: Metadata Standard Version
items.description: The name of the standard to which the metadata conforms

items.name: Ordering Instructions
items.description: General instructions, terms and services provided by the distributor

items.name: Resource Cost or Fees
items.description: Cost associated with access to the resource

items.description: Typical turnaround time for the filling of an order.

Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

items.name: Resource Use Constraints
items.description: Information about how the data may or may not be used after access is granted to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the data set. Data providers may request acknowledgement of the data from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness of data.

items.name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Explanation
items.description: The identification of the test that yielded the Horizontal Positional Accuracy Value.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Report
items.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Value
items.description: an estimate of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurement in the data set expressed in (ground) meters.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Explanation
items.description: The identification of the test that yielded the Vertical Positional Accuracy Value.

items.name: Source Citation
items.description: Reference to the processing input source.

items.name: Media
items.description: Media on which the resource is available

items.name: Source Time Period
items.description: Time period for which the source data set corresponds to the ground.

items.name: Source Citation Abbreviation
items.description: Short-form alias for the source citation.

items.name: Source Description
items.description: Detailed description of the source.

items.name: Process Step Description
items.description: Description of the event, including related parameters or tolerances.

items.name: Source Used
items.description: The source used in the processing step.

items.name: Process Step Time
items.description: Date, time, range or period of process step.

items.name: Source Produced
items.description: The source produced from the process step.

items.name: Processor
items.description: Identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organisation(s) associated with the process step.

spirals.title: FGDC for Data Discovery - Mandatory
spirals.description: The FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata includes fields in the Identification Information and Metadata Reference Sections that are mandatory for data discovery. In the graphical representation of the standard, these are yellow fields included in yellow sections.

items.name: Resource Title
items.description: A short description of the resource. The title should be descriptive enough so that when a user is presented with a list of titles the general content of the data set can be determined.

items.name: Originating Organization
items.description: The organization responsible for creating the resource

items.name: Publication Date
items.description: Date of publication of the cited resource

items.name: Abstract
items.note: This concept is called Desciption in Catalog Services for the Web.
items.description: A paragraph describing the resource.

items.name: Purpose
items.description: A paragraph describing the original purpose for collecting the dataset.

items.name: Resource Status
items.description: The status of the resource

items.name: Resource Update Frequency
items.description: The frequency with which changes and additions are made to the data set after the initial data set is completed

items.name: Temporal Extent
items.description: The temporal extent of the resource

items.name: Bounding Box
items.note: This concept is called Coverage in the CSW Specification
items.description: A bounding box for identifying a geographic area of interest

items.name: Resource Access Constraints
items.description: Information about any constraints for accessing the data set. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, limitations and/or warnings on obtaining the data set. Some words that may be used in this field include: Public, In-house, Limited, Additional detailed instructions on how to access the data can be entered in this field.

items.name: Resource Use Constraints
items.description: Information about how the data may or may not be used after access is granted to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property. This includes any special restrictions, legal prerequisites, terms and conditions, and/or limitations on using the data set. Data providers may request acknowledgement of the data from users and claim no responsibility for quality and completeness of data.

items.name: Keyword
items.description: A word or phrase that describes some aspect of a resource. Can be one of several types.

items.name: Distribution Liability
items.description: Statement of the liability assumed by the distributor.

items.name: Distribution Contact
items.description: Contact information for the organization or individual that distributes the resource.

items.name: Metadata Contact
items.description: The organization or person currently responsible for the metadata.

items.name: Metadata Standard Citation
items.description: The name of the standard to which the metadata conforms

items.name: Metadata Standard Version
items.description: The name of the standard to which the metadata conforms

items.name: Ordering Instructions
items.description: General instructions, terms and services provided by the distributor

items.name: Resource Cost or Fees
items.description: Cost associated with access to the resource

items.name: Turnaround
items.description: Typical turnaround time for the filling of an order.

spirals.title: FGDC for Data Discovery - Mandatory if Applicable
spirals.description: The FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata includes many fields related to data understanding. These are generally labeled 'Mandatory if Applicable'. In the graphical representation of the standard, these are green fields included in yellow or green sections.

items.name: Attribute Accuracy Report
items.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the identification of the entities and assignments of values in the data set and a description of the tests used

items.name: Attribute Accuracy Value
items.description: An estimate of the accuracy of the identification of the entities and assignments of attribute values in the data set

items.name: Attribute Accuracy Explanation
items.description: The identification of the test that yielded the Attribute Accuracy Value.

items.name: Logical Consistency Report
items.description: An explanation of the fidelity of relationships in the data set and tests used.

items.name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Report
items.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the horizontal coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.

items.name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Value
items.description: An estimate of the accuracy of the horizontal coordinate measurements in the data set expressed in (ground) meters.

items.name: Horizontal Positional Accuracy Explanation
items.description: The identification of the test that yielded the Horizontal Positional Accuracy Value.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Report
items.description: An explanation of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurements and a description of the tests used.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Value
items.description: an estimate of the accuracy of the vertical coordinate measurement in the data set expressed in (ground) meters.

items.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Explanation
items.description: The identification of the test that yielded the Vertical Positional Accuracy Value.
